# Airdrop-Sybil-Identification
Trusta Labs has developed the TrustScan product https://trustalabs.ai/trustscan for identifying valuabe users and  squelching Sybils. People who are interested in our Sybil identification method are recommendated to read our A [medium post](https://medium.com/@trustalabs.ai/trustas-ai-and-machine-learning-framework-for-robust-sybil-resistance-in-airdrops-ba17059ec5b7#id_token=eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6IjZmNzI1NDEwMWY1NmU0MWNmMzVjOTkyNmRlODRhMmQ1NTJiNGM2ZjEiLCJ0eXAiOiJKV1QifQ..O0dkVWX1cph2_dg7NqPGJ7qBJu3AvuBkIhwYmxMKDiwiHCZ3W1igJR6Z3nsxBrzhLmr3j7GB7_ldP9mrU6arSRVen1YAAZpaz0LPuBDaW5WO8RPj0x69p92JoEc9eHw7Rj__C3f0hs3J7zzNVLtS02uhRtDpjMzBkp2kxJxZiHwn55-JxlduPjgKPacf8eQ2PknUAU-QyF_mytivxbP8GPqCIHdwvqUGAjHbAHFuR0Gltq7KyDKD8t9fugRfWVkU3xkY4p1mlNg9LxVClFO7oFFGfd5Do9w4Vf21wV5OhX9RHhbBX5idwLQCtdjneVflEaiA_k1ydK8YrliB0j1g9g) .

In this repository, we will keep you updated on our Sybil resistance work. Not only our AI and machine learning framework for robust Sybil identification in airdrops is shared, but also some of addresses tags, data ingestion codes and data analytic codes. 

Sybil attacks undermining the integrity of retrospective airdrops in Web3. Greedy actors create fake accounts to unfairly earn more airdropped tokens. The article discusses different Sybil resistance approaches like proof-of-personhood and community reporting, highlighting their limitations. It then introduces Trustaâ€™s AI and machine learning powered framework to systematically analyze on-chain data and identify suspicious Sybil clusters. The 2-phase approach first uses graph mining algorithms to detect coordinated communities, then refines results with user behavior analysis to reduce false positives. Examples demonstrate how Trusta identified real onchain Sybil clusters. The article advocates AI-ML as a robust sybil resistance solution that preserves user privacy and permissionless participation.
